cause.description:
we will march one day, all believers will gather and let the world know we will no longer stand for this. Our very plants are being destroyed and wasted everyday because "they say it's illegal". I say legalize IT! and the world will be in peace again.
1. national marijuana uprooting day must end immediately
2. Mass cultivation must be allowed.
3. fight for herbal rights
cause.mission: to let the world know the herb is a blessing, not a curse
cause.name: Embrace Marijuana
